--- layout: component title: Empty space prompt description: 'There are three primary uses for empty space prompts:
  1. First use. The user begins to interact with the application/site.
  2. User cleared. The user has just completed a task or cleared all content associated with the app or site.
  3. The user has encountered a roadblock during the interaction.
Empty space prompts should help the user guide them along to the next logical step.' guidelines: do: - Use as a space for increasing adoption if the user has never used the application before - Prompt users towards new interactions when they have completed required tasks - Indicate that no results are available after the user has entered a search dont: - Use to indicate that there are unfinished tasks still available - Use when there are available results contents: - Usage guidelines - Basic prompt ---
